Using a large quantity of [[sand]], the user covers the enemy with several successive layers of the material, before compressing it into the form of a huge pyramid which serves to imprison the target upon its completion. [[Sealing tag]]s can be placed onto the pyramid to increase its sealing power, or [[Shukaku]] can strengthen the seal with the [[juinjutsu]] that cover its body.

== Trivia ==
* The shape variants of this technique differs to fit the size of the target. A simple pyramid is used for smaller opponents, while a step pyramid is used for larger or more powerful foes.
